file_complaint_ips.title: File Complaint with Independent Investigation Unit (IIU)
file_complaint_ips.description: IIU investigates serious incidents involving police including death, serious injury, or allegations of a criminal nature.
file_complaint_ips.timeframe: Immediate - IIU is automatically notified but you can also report

file_complaint_police_service.title: File Complaint with Police Service
file_complaint_police_service.description: File complaint directly with Winnipeg Police Service or RCMP for conduct issues.

law_enforcement_review_agency.title: Appeal to Law Enforcement Review Agency (LERA)
law_enforcement_review_agency.description: If dissatisfied with police service's handling of complaint, appeal to LERA for independent review.
law_enforcement_review_agency.timeframe: Within 30 days of receiving police decision

contactInfo.address: Law Enforcement Review Agency, 340-155 Carlton Street, Winnipeg, MB R3C 3H8

understanding_child_protection.title: Understanding Manitoba Child and Family Services
understanding_child_protection.description: Child and Family Services (CFS) agencies provide child protection services in Manitoba.

internal_complaint.title: File Internal Complaint with CFS Agency
internal_complaint.description: File complaint with your local CFS agency or the agency handling your case.

children_advocate.title: Manitoba Advocate for Children and Youth
children_advocate.description: Independent office that investigates child welfare concerns and advocates for improvements.
children_advocate.timeframe: After internal complaint or immediately if urgent

ombudsman.title: Manitoba Ombudsman
ombudsman.description: Investigates complaints about provincial government services including child welfare.
